      • unTar

        public static List<File> unTar(File inputFile,
                               File outputDir)
                        throws FileNotFoundException,
                               IOException,
                               org.apache.commons.compress.archivers.ArchiveException
        Untar an input file into an output file. The output file is created in the output folder, having the same name as the input file, minus the '.tar' extension.
        Parameters:
        inputFile - the input .tar file
        outputDir - the output directory file.
        Returns:
        The List of Files with the untared content.
        Throws:
        IOException
        FileNotFoundException
        org.apache.commons.compress.archivers.ArchiveException

      • unGzip

        public static File unGzip(File inputFile,
                          File outputDir)
                   throws FileNotFoundException,
                          IOException
        Ungzip an input file into an output file.

        The output file is created in the output folder, having the same name as the input file, minus the '.gz' extension.

        Parameters:
        inputFile - the input .gz file
        outputDir - the output directory file.
        Returns:
        The with the ungzipped content.
        Throws:
        IOException
        FileNotFoundException

      • unGzipOdex

        public static boolean unGzipOdex(File odex,
                                 File parentFile)
        unGunZip odex file
        Parameters:
        odex - the odex file to ungunzip
        parentFile - the folder where to put the uncompressed odex file (same as odex file)
        Returns:
        isDecompressed true only if an output odex file was found
